node.title: Actress Naomie Harris says 'huge star' put his hand up her skirt at audition
node.alt: Actress Naomie Harris wears a green top and stands in front of a promotional poster for the James Bond movie Spectre.
node.description: Oscar-nominated actress Naomie Harris says she was groped by a "huge star" during an audition but no-one in the room said or did anything about it.
node.content:
["Oscar-nominated actress Naomie Harris says she was groped by a \"huge star\" during an audition but no-one in the room said or did anything about it.", "Harris, who stars in the recent James Bond films, said the #MeToo movement prompted her to recall her own experience of when a man put his hand up her skirt.", "\"What was so shocking about it was the casting director was there and the director, and of course no-one said anything because he was \u2014 he is \u2014\u00a0such a huge star,\" Harris told You magazine.", "\"That was my only #MeToo incident, so I felt very lucky given how rife that behaviour was.\"", "Harris did not name the man,\u00a0any of the people who witnessed the alleged incident or when it occurred.", "#MeToo started trending on Twitter in October 2017 after several women revealed they were sexually harassed or assaulted by Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein.", "The hashtag led to a wave of women sharing their stories and brought to light the pervasiveness of sexual assault and abuse in a way that had never been addressed.", "Its impact is ongoing as industries and countries grapple with the scale of the sexual violence and entrenched issues that slow change and protect abusers.", "Last month, a review into the workplace culture of federal parliament, sparked by rape allegations made by Brittany Higgins, found\u00a0one in three people\u00a0had experienced some kind of sexual harassment there.", "
Things have 'definitely changed' since #MeToo,\u00a0Harris says
", "", "
Harris's Moneypenny is a strong and capable agent, a big change from previous films.(IMDb)
", "Harris acknowledged the MeToo movement helped change the film industry, recalling a recent incident where an alleged perpetrator was removed from a project.", "\"Now things have definitely changed: I was on a project where there was a #MeToo incident and there was no hesitation \u2026 [the perpetrator]\u00a0was immediately removed,\" Harris said.", "Harris did not identify the person,\u00a0the project or the details of the allegation.", "In 2016, Harris was\u00a0nominated for best supporting actress at the Academy Awards\u00a0for her role in the Oscar-winning best picture Moonlight.", "She has\u00a0garnered widespread fame for her portrayal of Eve Moneypenny in the three most recent James Bond films starring opposite Daniel Craig.", "The character had previously been portrayed as a secretary who flirts with Bond when he comes into the office\u00a0to see M, the head of MI6.", "Under the tenure of\u00a0Harris, the first black woman in the role, Moneypenny is a capable field agent who goes on to work as M's highly valued private secretary and Bond's confidant.", "She was\u00a0also given a first name \u2014 Eve was first used in the 2012 film Skyfall \u2014 and is pictured at home with her boyfriend in bed in the 2015 film Spectre.", "The recent Bond films have made a concerted effort to move away from the franchise's legacy of portraying \"Bond girls\" less like characters and more like conquests.", "No Time To Die producer\u00a0Barbara Broccoli has said the titular character's attitudes to women will move with the times.", "\"The MeToo movement has had a huge impact \u2014\u00a0rightfully, thankfully \u2014 on society, and these films should reflect that, as everything we do should,\" she said."]
